openaiSpec.name: generate_image_with_flux_ultra
openaiSpec.description: Generates state-of-the-art images using the FLUX1.1 [pro] ultra model via the fal.ai API.

prompt.description: A detailed text description of the image to be generated. Be specific about the subject, style, composition, lighting, colors, and any other relevant details. The more descriptive the prompt, the better the desired image.

userSettings.name: fal_ai_api_key
userSettings.label: Fal.ai API Key
userSettings.description: Your API key for accessing the fal.ai service. Keep this key secure.

userSettings.name: num_images
userSettings.label: Number of Images
userSettings.description: The number of images to generate for each prompt. Default is 1.

userSettings.name: aspect_ratio
userSettings.label: Aspect Ratio
userSettings.description: The aspect ratio of the generated image. Default is 16:9.

userSettings.name: output_format
userSettings.label: Output Format
userSettings.description: The format of the generated image. Default is jpeg.

userSettings.name: raw
userSettings.label: Raw Image
userSettings.description: Generate less processed, more natural-looking images. Default is false.

userSettings.name: enable_safety_checker
userSettings.label: Enable Safety Checker
userSettings.description: Enables or disables the safety checker to filter out potentially NSFW content. Default is true.

userSettings.name: safety_tolerance
userSettings.label: Safety Tolerance
userSettings.description: The safety tolerance level for the generated image. 1 being the most strict and 6 being the most permissive. Default is 2.
